Posts.Content: HairSprayMom wrote: DX @37 Sep. 2007 Metaplastic Carcinoma Trip Neg Stage 3B (1&2cm tumor on chest wall) "Always remember CAN'T never could get anything done!" Dx 9/26/2007, 3cm, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 0/5 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Do you need a mastec/recon apron? HairSprayMom HairSprayMom

Posts.Content: HairSprayMom wrote: Well after almost 3 yrs of complications and 10 surgeries to try for foobs I got totally deconstructed today and I could not be happier! After 3 yrs of crap, it feels so good to just know I am done. I am going to have a chest tattoo piece done in a year after all of the scar tissue heals. Just wanted to let ya know I have joined the Breast Free and Proud club! XOXO DX @37 Sep. 2007 Metaplastic Carcinoma Trip Neg Stage 3B (1&2cm tumor on chest wall) "Always remember CAN'T never could get anything done!" Dx 9/26/2007, 3cm, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 0/5 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
